thread.title: Wingtra drone takes aerial mapping to the next level

title: Wingtra drone takes aerial mapping to the next level
text:
Wingtra drone takes aerial mapping to the next level 9:59am EST - 00:52 
A drone that takes off like a helicopter but flies like a plane has been developed by a spin-off team from ETH Zurich, as Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A drone that takes off like a helicopter but flies like a plane has been developed by a spin-off team from ETH Zurich, as Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EXfnXt
